text: The Elephant Man is a 1980 British American biographical drama movie directed by David Lynch. It stars John Hurt, Anthony Hopkins, Hannah Gordon, Anne Bancroft, Freddie Jones, John Gielgud, Wendy Hillier, Lesley Dunlop, Nula Conwell, Pauline Quirke, Dexter Flecther, Michael Elphick and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 8 Academy Awards in 1981. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies about disabilities Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:Movies directed by David Lynch Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies adapted into plays
title: The Elephant Man (movie)
